verses.verse: הַ֥לְלוּ <S%H1984><s%> Hal-lu Praise יָ֨הּ׀ <S%H3050><s%> yah ye the LORD הַֽלְל֣וּ <S%H1984><s%> hal-Lu Praise אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- יְ֭הוָה <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh ye the LORD מִן־ <S%H4480><s%> min- from הַשָּׁמַ֑יִם <S%H8064><s%> hash-sha-Ma-yim; from the heavens הַֽ֝לְל֗וּהוּ <S%H1984><s%> hal-Lu-hu, praise בַּמְּרוֹמִֽים׃ <S%H4791><s%> bam-me-ro-Mim. him in the heights

הַֽלְל֥וּהוּ <S%H1984><s%> hal-Lu-hu Praise כָל־ <S%H3605><s%> chol all מַלְאָכָ֑יו <S%H4397><s%> mal-'a-Chav; ye him all his angels הַֽ֝לְל֗וּהוּ <S%H1984><s%> hal-Lu-hu, praise כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> kol- all; צְבָאֹו tze-va-'ov כצְבָאָֽיו׃ <S%H6635><s%> tze-va-'Av. appointed time ק

הַֽ֭לְלוּהוּ <S%H1984><s%> Hal-lu-hu Praise שֶׁ֣מֶשׁ <S%H8121><s%> She-mesh ye him sun וְיָרֵ֑חַ <S%H3394><s%> ve-ya-Re-ach; and moon הַ֝לְל֗וּהוּ <S%H1984><s%> hal-Lu-hu, praise כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> kol- all כּ֥וֹכְבֵי <S%H3556><s%> Koch-vei him all ye stars אֽוֹר׃ <S%H216><s%> or. of light

הַֽ֭לְלוּהוּ <S%H1984><s%> Hal-lu-hu Praise שְׁמֵ֣י <S%H8064><s%> she-Mei him ye heavens הַשָּׁמָ֑יִם <S%H8064><s%> hash-sha-Ma-yim; of heavens וְ֝הַמַּ֗יִם <S%H4325><s%> ve-ham-Ma-yim, and ye waters אֲשֶׁ֤ר׀ <S%H834><s%> 'a-Sher after מֵעַ֬ל <S%H5921><s%> me-'Al and הַשָּׁמָֽיִם׃ <S%H8064><s%> hash-sha-Ma-yim. that [be] above the heavens

יְֽ֭הַֽלְלוּ <S%H1984><s%> Ye-hal-lu Let them praise אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- שֵׁ֣ם <S%H8034><s%> shem the name יְהוָ֑ה <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh; of the LORD כִּ֤י <S%H3588><s%> ki for ה֭וּא <S%H1931><s%> hu He צִוָּ֣ה <S%H6680><s%> tziv-Vah for he commanded וְנִבְרָֽאוּ׃ <S%H1254><s%> ve-niv-Ra-'u. and they were created

וַיַּעֲמִידֵ֣ם <S%H5975><s%> vai-ya-'a-mi-Dem He hath also stablished לָעַ֣ד <S%H5703><s%> la-'Ad them for ever לְעוֹלָ֑ם <S%H5769><s%> le-'o-Lam; and ever חָק־ <S%H2706><s%> chok- a decree נָ֝תַ֗ן <S%H5414><s%> na-Tan, he hath made וְלֹ֣א <S%H3808><s%> ve-Lo which will not יַעֲבֽוֹר׃ <S%H5674><s%> ya-'a-Vor. which shall not pass

הַֽלְל֣וּ <S%H1984><s%> hal-Lu Praise אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- יְ֭הוָה <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh the LORD מִן־ <S%H4480><s%> min- from הָאָ֑רֶץ <S%H776><s%> ha-'A-retz; from the earth תַּ֝נִּינִ֗ים <S%H8577><s%> tan-ni-Nim, ye dragons וְכָל־ <S%H3605><s%> ve-chol and all תְּהֹמֽוֹת׃ <S%H8415><s%> te-ho-Mot. and all deeps

אֵ֣שׁ <S%H784><s%> 'esh Fire וּ֭בָרָד <S%H1259><s%> U-va-rod and hail שֶׁ֣לֶג <S%H7950><s%> She-leg snow וְקִיט֑וֹר <S%H7008><s%> ve-ki-Tor; and vapour ר֥וּחַ <S%H7307><s%> Ru-ach wind סְ֝עָרָ֗ה <S%H5591><s%> se-'a-Rah, stormy עֹשָׂ֥ה <S%H6213><s%> 'o-Sah fulfilling דְבָרֽוֹ׃ <S%H1697><s%> de-va-Ro. his word

הֶהָרִ֥ים <S%H2022><s%> he-ha-Rim Mountains וְכָל־ <S%H3605><s%> ve-chol and all גְּבָע֑וֹת <S%H1389><s%> ge-va-'ot; and all hills עֵ֥ץ <S%H6086><s%> 'etz trees פְּ֝רִ֗י <S%H6529><s%> pe-Ri, fruitful וְכָל־ <S%H3605><s%> ve-chol and all אֲרָזִֽים׃ <S%H730><s%> 'a-ra-Zim. and all cedars

הַֽחַיָּ֥ה <S%H2416><s%> ha-chai-Yah Beasts וְכָל־ <S%H3605><s%> ve-chol and all בְּהֵמָ֑ה <S%H929><s%> be-he-Mah; and all cattle רֶ֝֗מֶשׂ <S%H7431><s%> Re-mes, creeping things וְצִפּ֥וֹר <S%H6833><s%> ve-tzip-Por fowl כָּנָֽף׃ <S%H3671><s%> ka-Naf. and flying

מַלְכֵי־ <S%H4428><s%> mal-chei- Kings אֶ֭רֶץ <S%H776><s%> 'E-retz of the earth וְכָל־ <S%H3605><s%> ve-chol and all לְאֻמִּ֑ים <S%H3816><s%> le-'um-Mim; and all people שָׂ֝רִ֗ים <S%H8269><s%> Rim, princes וְכָל־ <S%H3605><s%> ve-chol and all שֹׁ֥פְטֵי <S%H8199><s%> Sho-fe-tei and all judges אָֽרֶץ׃ <S%H776><s%> 'A-retz. of the earth

בַּחוּרִ֥ים <S%H970><s%> ba-chu-Rim Both young men וְגַם־ <S%H1571><s%> ve-gam- again בְּתוּל֑וֹת <S%H1330><s%> be-tu-Lot; and maidens זְ֝קֵנִ֗ים <S%H2205><s%> ze-ke-Nim, old men עִם־ <S%H5973><s%> 'im- with נְעָרִֽים׃ <S%H5288><s%> ne-'a-Rim. and children

יְהַלְל֤וּ׀ <S%H1984><s%> ye-hal-Lu Let them praise אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- שֵׁ֬ם <S%H8034><s%> shem the name יְהוָ֗ה <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh of the LORD כִּֽי־ <S%H3588><s%> ki- for נִשְׂגָּ֣ב <S%H7682><s%> nis-Gav alone is excellent שְׁמ֣וֹ <S%H8034><s%> she-Mo for his name לְבַדּ֑וֹ <S%H905><s%> le-vad-Do; alone ה֝וֹד֗וֹ <S%H1935><s%> ho-Do, his glory עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> 'al- is above אֶ֥רֶץ <S%H776><s%> 'E-retz [is] above the earth וְשָׁמָֽיִם׃ <S%H8064><s%> ve-sha-Ma-yim. and heaven

וַיָּ֤רֶם <S%H7311><s%> vai-Ya-rem He also exalteth קֶ֨רֶן׀ <S%H7161><s%> Ke-ren the horn לְעַמּ֡וֹ <S%H5971><s%> le-'am-Mo of his people תְּהִלָּ֤ה <S%H8416><s%> te-hil-Lah the praise לְֽכָל־ <S%H3605><s%> le-chol for all חֲסִידָ֗יו <S%H2623><s%> cha-si-Dav, of all his saints לִבְנֵ֣י <S%H1121><s%> liv-Nei [even] of the children יִ֭שְׂרָאֵל <S%H3478><s%> Yis-ra-'el of Israel עַֽם־ <S%H5971><s%> 'am- a people קְרֹב֗וֹ <S%H7138><s%> ke-ro-Vo, near הַֽלְלוּ־ <S%H1984><s%> hal-lu- unto him Praise יָֽהּ׃ <S%H3050><s%> Yah. ye the LORD
